mapper.insert: insert into base_disease(id , hosp_code, type_code, code, attach_code, name, usual_name, nation_code,nation_name, is_add, pym, wbm, is_valid, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time,is_infectious,infectious_name,infectious_interval_days,seq_no,platform_code) values (#{id},#{hospCode}, #{typeCode}, #{code}, #{attachCode}, #{name}, #{usualName}, #{nationCode},#{nationName}, #{isAdd}, #{pym}, #{wbm}, '1', #{crteId}, #{crteName}, #{crteTime},#{isCrb},#{crbName},#{crbInterval},#{seqNo},#{platformCode})

insert into base_disease_rule(id, hosp_code, drug_id, disease_id, type_code, prompt_msg, is_valid, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time) values
(#{item.id}, #{item.hospCode}, #{item.drugId}, #{item.diseaseId}, #{item.typeCode}, #{item.promptMsg}, #{item.isValid}, #{item.crteId}, #{item.crteName}, #{item.crteTime})
mapper.select: SELECT t1.id, t1.hosp_code, t2.usual_name AS drug_name, t2.spec, t2.unit_code, t2.price, ( SELECT b.NAME FROM base_disease b WHERE b.id = t1.disease_id AND b.hosp_code = t1.hosp_code ) AS disease_name, t1.type_code, t1.prompt_msg, t1.is_valid, t1.crte_id, t1.crte_name, t1.crte_time FROM base_disease_rule t1, base_drug t2 WHERE t1.drug_id = t2.id AND t1.hosp_code = t2.hosp_code AND t1.hosp_code = #{hospCode} AND t1.is_valid = #{isValid} AND t1.disease_id = #{id} ORDER BY t1.crte_time DESC

select a.id, a.hosp_code, a.type_code, a.code, a.name, a.usual_name, a.attach_code, a.nation_code, a.is_add, a.pym,a.wbm, a.is_valid, a.crte_id, a.crte_name, a.crte_time from base_disease a left join insure_disease_match b on a.id = b.hosp_illness_id where b.hosp_illness_id is null and a.hosp_code=#{hospCode} and a.is_valid ='1'
and (code like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or wbm like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or pym like concat('%',#{keyword},'%'))
order by a.crte_time
select * from insure_disease_match where hosp_code = #{hospCode} and insure_reg_code = #{insureRegCode} and is_match = '1'
